mapper.select: /* getActiveInItems */ select idx, type, mcid, cid, purity_title, content_title, origin_title, titleshort, regdate, regid, stat, director, year, actors_display, poster_url, country_of_origin from in_items where stat = 'Y' order by regdate asc limit 50;
mapper.update: /* uptInItemsStat */ update in_items set stat = #{stat} where idx = #{idx}
